item.description: Need somewhere to bring your pet to play during the cold winter months? Come play at our meet up. All friendly dogs welcome to romp. All breeds of dogs welcome. Fill your dog's day with energy-burning fun and relaxation among friends.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk. Meet up will be held in the Daycamp room.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Wonderland Meet Up
